pages.text: I don't understand. Instead of pickling, the $(item)sporebrush$() I placed in the jar has instead $(key)woven itself into a ring$(). Was there more $(thing)influence$() left in those ashes than I thought? I feel the atmosphere's energy dimming. Did it draw from there?$(br)Whatever happened, there is now a $(item)ring$() in my palm. It's woven elegantly, intentionally. This was not a mere act of fate.

The $(item)ring$() is calling to me. It's not quite a voice, but more of a feeling. A $(thing)will$(). $(h)Something$(/h) needs help. I need to help it. The $(item)ring$() can give me that power. All I need to do is $(key)put it on$().
